snippet: Soffiyah Elijah of the Correctional Association of New York writes that “we must not clear our conscience on solitary confinement by carving out exceptions.”
lead_paragraph: Soffiyah Elijah of the Correctional Association of New York writes that “we must not clear our conscience on solitary confinement by carving out exceptions.”
